OOC: One more "OOC" post from either of you and you're both moderated!  I'v=
e always wanted to say that!  *slaps self on side of head*  Damn, I'm no mo=
derator!
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Yanshosh@... 
  To: nb=
wrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, April 24, 2001 9:43 PM
  Subject: Re=
: Wolfgang


  Yanshosh ignorance? Allright, the only reason I'm replying t=
o this is
  to argue that statement. I don't think I'm quite that ignorant =
to
  forget the history of a faction that my character had a major part of
=
  creating, and had led ever since. As I remember it, my version is
  accur=
ate, and if you can tell me what's wrong about it, I'll admit my
  mistake.=
 But I've been with the Alliance about 20 times longer than
  you, UnderT, =
so I would know its history very well.

  ::FZ::

  FZ nodded. "You can say=
 that, yes."

  He wasn't sure whether Wolfgang would try to take control o=
r not, but
  if he would ... well, there were three armed troops loyal to F=
Z in the
  room, and the Iron Fist had very good internal defences.

  "Its=
 been a long time after you were last online, Wolfgang. How are
  you feeli=
ng?"
